tool_description: Restores user data, application settings, and system configurations from previously created backups after OS installation or recovery operations.

backup_file_path.description: Path to the backup file created by Data Backup Creator

restoration_type.description: Type of restoration: user_data, application_settings, system_config, or selective

target_user_profile.description: Target user profile for data restoration

overwrite_existing.description: Whether to overwrite existing files with restored data

verify_restored_data.description: Whether to verify integrity of restored data

error_messages: Backup file not found: The specified backup file path does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid restoration type: Use one of [user_data, application_settings, system_config, selective].
Target user profile not found: Specified user profile does not exist on the current system.
Data restoration failed: Unable to restore data from backup file.
Backup file corrupted: The backup file appears to be damaged or corrupted.
Insufficient disk space: Not enough free space to restore all backed up data.
Data verification failed: Restored data failed integrity verification.
usage: Provide backup_file_path from previous backup operation. Choose restoration_type based on needs (user_data for documents and files, application_settings for program configurations). Set target_user_profile if restoring to different user account.

files_restored.description: Number of files successfully restored from backup

data_size_restored_gb.description: Total size of restored data in gigabytes

restoration_duration_minutes.description: Time taken to complete data restoration in minutes

failed_restorations.description: List of files or settings that could not be restored
